title: Against the Fall of Night
description: The 10-billion-year-old metropolis of Diaspar is humanity's last home. Alone among immortals, the only man born in 10 million years desperately wants to find what lies beyond the City. His quest will uncover the destiny of a people-and a galaxy.First published in a magazine Startling Stories, November 1948. Next appearance was in paperback book form in 1953.
author: Arthur C. Clarke
